From 2016 to 2018, 2 DBS cards were collected from 340 patients under clinical follow up at Monkole and Kalembelembe Hospitals (Kinshasa, DRC), 71 HIV-infected children (0–14 years) and adolescents (15–21 years) and 269 HIV-infected adults (more than 22 years). DBS preparation and viral load quantification was performed using Cobas Ampliprep/Cobas Taqman HIV-1 test v2.0 (Roche) as previously reported
